title: I hope Riot completely GUTS Katarina's ult next patch.
body:
seriously, at level six it's "one shots EVERYWHERE"

why havent they nerfed it?

cause you can just ward jump into their turret, press r, wait for 0.7 seconds, then you get out of turret with another ward jump, and BAM insant kill

So tired of this

replies.body: one of the main problems with kat is you can deny her all game and if you make a mistake and she gets a triple kill or higher (which isn't hard for a kat to do). GG she is now massive
well in normals going up against a kat main smurf isn't the easiest thing to not slip up against
Doesn't matter learn to play safer, spam the assistance button you can always win no matter who your opponent is you just have to think strategically how to beat her/him
to be honest, how you deal with a kat, if your low like 1/4 just recall, if she is fed and your anything less than 3/4, just recall. you beat her by not allowing resets.

I hope you realise kat's been extremely weak for a long time

even if she was she is getting reworked (because unhealtily weak unless ahead)

She isn't that hard to beat, as you can crush her in the laning phase with most champions. While yes she is an annoying champ to be up against if you work with your team and hard cc her (like with a Nautilus or something) she really isn't that hard. And I'm pretty sure in the assassin rework her ult base damage is increasing, but the ap scaling is getting nerved.

Don't worry, I hate her too.
Well they're getting rid of her ward jumping in her rework last I checked if that's any consolation.
Thanks for telling me that, so she can't jump in turret and smash you, YAY

she use to be OP when you start playing league after 3 years of playing you get use to countering her with champions with CC, Once she loses ult shes weak wouldnt worry too much Kat is pretty balanced TBH as Maximum said below, Shes that champion that will kill you if you slip up.. its pretty much her kit

I think you are over exaggerating a bit... But in all seriousness if you just power farm and poke Kat out of lane you should have enough gold to build a cloak and negate most of her damage at level six
She's part of the assassin rework
